author: artagnon
msg: svnrdump: dump_editor.c: Consistently allocate data for props from the
same memory pool. Incidentally, this fixes two tests that were
for `eb->props` and `eb->deleted_props` was being taken from
`pool`. Change all these instances to use `eb->pool` instead.

author: cmpilato
msg: Propose r1000060 for backport, and note that r989658 has been superceded.

author: philip
msg: (gather_children): Fix a typo so that a NODES query is used.  This is
sufficient for basic_tests to have only 2 FAILs with SVN_WC__NODES_ONLY.

author: ruwan
msg: Fixing the axiom version and Axis2 API link
